analysis.description: FreezableToken.toKey (/unique_chucks/32/0xdc014502643ca2ef9ff00443a4a1e5b178184a95.sol#512-528) is declared view but contains assembly code

FreezableToken.releaseOnce (/unique_chucks/32/0xdc014502643ca2ef9ff00443a4a1e5b178184a95.sol#475-497) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(uint64(block.timestamp) > head) (/unique_chucks/32/0xdc014502643ca2ef9ff00443a4a1e5b178184a95.sol#480-481)

FreezableToken.releaseAll (/unique_chucks/32/0xdc014502643ca2ef9ff00443a4a1e5b178184a95.sol#503-512) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- release != 0 && block.timestamp > release (/unique_chucks/32/0xdc014502643ca2ef9ff00443a4a1e5b178184a95.sol#506-512)

FreezableToken.freeze (/unique_chucks/32/0xdc014502643ca2ef9ff00443a4a1e5b178184a95.sol#528-563) uses timestamp for comparisons
